name: Schema Details
query:
SELECT 'DocType Field' AS "DocType Field::50",
 df.parent as 'Parent:Link/Patient:100',
 df.fieldname as 'Field Name::50',
    df.label as 'Field Full Name::200',
 df.options as 'Linked To DocType:Link/DocType:100',
 dt.istable as 'Is Child::15',
    dt.issingle as 'Is Single::15',
 dt.is_tree as 'Is Tree::15',
 dt.module as 'Module Name:Link/Module Def:100',
    m.app_name as 'App Name::100',
 dt.restrict_to_domain as 'Domain',
 dt.allow_guest_to_view as 'Allow Guest to View'
  FROM `tabDocField` as df
  INNER JOIN `tabDocType` as dt ON df.parent = dt.name
  INNER JOIN `tabModule Def` as m ON dt.module = m.name
  WHERE df.fieldtype = 'Link'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Custom Field'AS "Custom Field::50",
 df.parent as 'Parent:Link/Patient:100',
 df.fieldname as 'Field Name::50',
    df.label as 'Field Full Name::200',
 df.options as 'Linked To DocType:Link/DocType:100',
 dt.istable as 'Is Child::15',
    dt.issingle as 'Is Single::15',
 dt.is_tree as 'Is Tree::15',
 dt.module as 'Module Name:Link/Module Def:100',
    m.app_name as 'App Name::100',
 dt.restrict_to_domain as 'Domain',
 dt.allow_guest_to_view as 'Allow Guest to View'
  FROM `tabCustom Field` as df
  INNER JOIN `tabDocType` as dt ON df.dt = dt.name
  INNER JOIN `tabModule Def` as m ON dt.module = m.name
  WHERE df.fieldtype = 'Link'
